selectedVerses.text: let me pass through all your flock today, removing from it every speckled and spotted sheep and every black lamb, and the spotted and speckled among the goats, and they shall be my wages.
My skin turns black and falls from me, and my bones burn with heat.
The first chariot had red horses, the second black horses,
But these are the ones that you shall not eat: the eagle, the bearded vulture, the black vulture,
The chariot with the black horses goes toward the north country, the white ones go after them, and the dappled ones go toward the south country."
